projects.name: Climate prediction- Weatherly
projects.description: Developed Weatherly, a user-friendly weather application with real-time updates, detailed forecasts, and an integrated chatbot for personalized weather queries.

projects.name: Cube
projects.description: Cube helps organize educational chat groups by introducing sub-grouping, making it easier to find important messages like announcements and timetables. It reduces clutter, improving communication for both educators and students.

projects.name: Discern
projects.description: An AI-powered solution for accurate disease prediction and noise elimination using filters in Chest X-rays. Providing a radiologist-like second opinion, it enhances reliability in diagnosing common chest diseases.

projects.name: Equikey (Final Year)
projects.description: A Blockchain Based Real Estate Marketplace.

projects.name: Notice Board (2nd Year)
projects.description: Online Notice Board streamlines college communication by providing a centralized platform for real-time updates on notices, eliminating issues like overlapping posts and missed information
